project.name: virtualizer
project.description: Shows how very large reports could be generated using a report virtualizer to optimize memory consumption.

target.name: javac
target.description: Compiles the java source files of the test application.

target.name: compile
target.description: Compiles the XML report design and produces the .jasper file.

target.name: view
target.description: Fills the report and launches the report viewer to preview it.

target.name: print
target.description: Fills the report and sends it to the printer.

target.name: pdf
target.description: Fills the report and generates a PDF version of it.

target.name: xml
target.description: Fills the report and generates a XML version of it.

target.name: xmlEmbed
target.description: Fills the report and generates a XML version of it.

target.name: html
target.description: Fills the report and generates a HTML version of it.

target.name: csv
target.description: Fills the report and generates a CSV version of it.

target.name: export
target.description: Fills the report and exports to PDF, XML, HTML and CSV.

target.name: viewDesignXml
target.description: Launches the design viewer to preview the XML report design.

target.name: viewDesign
target.description: Launches the design viewer to preview the compiled report design.

target.name: decompile
target.description: Decompiles a .jasper file into a .jrxml file.

target.name: writeApi
target.description: Generates a .java version of the report by converting the .jrxml file.

target.name: writeApiXml
target.description: Generates a .jrxml version of the report by executing the API version of the report design.
